channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Unbeatable
channel.desc: Today, Andy, Stuart, Alice and Charlotte battle it out to see which one of them is unbeatable.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Great Barrier Reef
channel.desc: Amazingly, only seven percent of the Great Barrier Reef is coral and the remainder is a variety of interconnected habitats including the world's oldest jungle, hundreds of islands, mangrove swamps, mysterious deep water gardens, vast sand flats and meadows of sea grass. A giant deep-water lagoon connects all of these, and many of the creatures that live in it are almost impossibly weird.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: Paul Martin presents from the Milestones Museum in Basingstoke, where he discovers more about the industries and people that made the area a magnet during the Industrial age.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Sir Chris Hoy, Rosie Jones, Ola Labib and Ian `H' Watkins test their general knowledge skills.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Anna Haugh's Big Irish Food Tour
channel.desc: Mrs. Brown's Boys' actor Eilish O'Carroll joins Anna to explore their native Dublin. They head to Moore Street where the traditional market meets global street food.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Grand Tours of Scotland's Rivers
channel.desc: Paul discovers the source of the remarkable River Nith, high in a remote forestry plantation. Heading downstream, he hears the story of the Knockshinnoch mining disaster, how 116 men were saved from entombment after a massive earth collapse.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Dad's Army
channel.desc: The platoon is ordered to assist in the making of a training film, but Captain Mainwaring is disgusted to learn that his men will be playing the parts of Nazi soldiers.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
channel.desc: The pair head to the incredible tidal outcrop of Burgh Island on the south coast of Devon, where their quarry is wrasse. As Paul arrives on the island, Bob kick-starts their trip with a huge surprise for Paul.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Jules and Greg's Wild Swim
channel.desc: Jules and Greg take the plunge into the Isle of Skye's dramatic rock pools and waterfalls.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Saving Lives in Cardiff
channel.desc: Neurosurgery consultant George Eralil has prioritised a patient with trigeminal neuralgia. The orthopaedic department faces higher demand. 50-year-old Chris has a large neuroendocrine tumour in his chest. Its position makes it very hard to remove.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Upstart Crow
channel.desc: Will has decided to write a play about the life of Julius Caesar. The only problem is how to deal with his assassination. After all Her Majesty is not likely to approve of any play about doing in the head of state, and Robert Greene is particularly keen to label Will a traitor.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Unspun World with John Simpson
channel.desc: John Simpson brings his expertise to bear on the most important stories. In discussion with the BBC's range of experts across the world, he uses their unique local knowledge to go beyond the headlines to get to the unspun truth about the world.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: VE Day 80: We Were There
channel.desc: As the nation marks 80 years since the end of the Second World War in Europe, Rachel Burden speaks to Britain's last veterans about their memories of the VE Day celebrations.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Make Me Perfect: Manufacturing Beauty in China
channel.desc: In China today, looking good is seen as key to career success. With beauty videos promoting extreme weight-loss flooding social media, beauty apps making booking surgery click of a button away, China's cosmetic surgery industry is booming.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Louis Theroux: The Settlers
channel.desc: Fourteen years after his first visit, Louis Theroux meets some of the growing community of religious-nationalist Israelis who have settled in the occupied West Bank. Louis also meets Palestinians, whose lives have been impacted by settlers.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: This Is BBC TWO
channel.desc: A preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: A Newcastle house in seemingly great condition but with a suspiciously low guide price has Martel wondering what the catch is. Tommy's lot in Wrexham is in need of a big old clear-out before anyone can get started. Owain is in Somerset where a mid-terrace just needs a bit of updating.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Bidding Room
channel.desc: Nigel Havers presides as five sellers aim to get the best price for their items, including a meditation rug, a pestle and mortar, a decorative mirrored-side cabinet, Linguaphone vinyl, a side board and hairpins.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Gardeners' World
channel.desc: Joe Swift and Rachel de Thame are in the North Wessex Downs spending the day at Malverleys, a stunning garden transformed in just 14 years by a very talented head gardener. Spring is a busy time and there's plenty for them to muck in with.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC News
channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: Terraces in Durham and Beddau and a majestic-looking period semi-detached in Crewe are sold at auction. Martin, Dion and Martel meet the new owners and hear how they plan to turn a profit from their bricks-and-mortar investments.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: Eric Knowles and the teams hunt for antiques in Cambridgeshire with experts Colin Young and Raj Bisram. Eric takes some time out to visit the local Norris Museum to look at a collection of ice skates and learn about the golden age of fenland skating.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC News Special
channel.desc: Two-minute silence for VE Day.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Blue Planet II
channel.desc: The big blue is the world's greatest wilderness, far from shore and many kilometres deep. It's a vast marine desert where there is little to eat and nowhere to hide. Yet it's home to some of the biggest and most spectacular creatures on earth.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Politics Live
channel.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Impossible
channel.desc: Contestants compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Lightning
channel.desc: Comedian Zoe Lyons presents the electrifyingly fast quiz with a ?3,000 jackpot. Six plucky contestants compete across six rounds testing their general knowledge, quick thinking and speedy reactions whilst our ruthless spotlight patrols the studio.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Unbeatable
channel.desc: Today, Olivia, AF, Gavin and Zoe battle it out to see which one of them is unbeatable.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Great Barrier Reef
channel.desc: The Great Barrier Reef is vitally linked to the rest of the planet in many ways. Creatures travel for thousands of miles to visit in spectacular numbers, including tiger sharks, great whales, seabirds and the largest green turtle. Weather systems travelling from across the Pacific also affect the whole reef, with weather patterns and climate change likely to further shape the area and its wildlife.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Flog It!
channel.desc: Paul Martin presents from Norwich cathedral in Norfolk. Among the items are an old astronomical map and a watercolour by a local artist. Meanwhile, Paul explores the history of the Broads.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
channel.desc: Sir Chris Hoy, Rosie Jones, Ola Labib and Ian `H' Watkins test their general knowledge skills.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Anna Haugh's Big Irish Food Tour
channel.desc: Comedian Ed Byrne escapes to the Wicklow Mountains with Anna for a hike and a surprise meal. They spot sika deer in Glendalough and visit a farm producing halloumi-style cheese.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
channel.desc: Musical mates Samantha Fox and Sinitta are grooving in their 1987 Lotus Excel, rocking their way through Kent and Surrey. With ?400 each to spend, their support acts are Steven Moore and Tim Medhurst.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Digging for Britain
channel.desc: The north of England is so rich in archaeological finds that Alice Roberts is travelling back there once again to reveal more of its fascinating history. She starts this journey at that most spectacular of Roman monuments, Hadrian's Wall.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Marie-Antoinette
channel.desc: Marie Antoinette and Louis prove themselves to be merciful and competent rulers with their decision to reward skilled labour over privilege of birth. But enemies lurk everywhere. Chartres founds a rival court in Paris.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Detectorists
channel.desc: After recent revelations, Lance, Andy, Becky and Sophie are all trying to come to terms with an uncertain future. In fact, only one of them is going to get a good night's sleep when Terry puts his emergency plan into action.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Newsnight
channel.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the day's top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Their Finest
channel.desc: In 1940, a married woman and a screenwriter were working together on a propaganda film about the evacuation of Allied troops from Dunkirk, France. As they work together they notice a growing attraction.
